header.title: Jesktop.net - Free/Open Applications
header.subtitle: XBrowser
header.notice: Jesktop documentation is under construction. Everything you can find outside this page is to be considered obsolete.

s1.title: XBrowser
s1.p: Armond Avanes and his team have written a html browser in pure Swing/Java and that does a very good job of rendering web content. There's no JavaScript yet, but it's planned. It's fairly full featured other than that (history, navigation aids, bookmarks). See below:

The current code is a fork of the version 3.3 codebase, done by Armond himself If you like what you see, please send an email to Armond to encourage him further!. The application is GPL licensed and the binary and source versions are available here.
A zip of the source for XBrowser : XBrowser3_3_JesktopSrc.zip - 785K.
An installable jar of XBrowser : XBrowser3_3_Jesktop.jar - 718K (don't forget to right click / save-as in Netscape).

s1.title: Main XBrowser Site
s1.p: Please visit the home page for XBrowser and support this excellent application: http://www.geocities.com/xa_arnold/XBrowser.html
Please also take a look at the sourceforge site for XBrowser http://xbrowser.sourceforge.net.
